channel.title: ParaScape 317, Looking for active players and staff!
channel.description:
Hello, I'm making my own Runescape Private Server, It's a 317 InsidiaX server, with 525 Graphics, Torva, And lots more awesome feautures. We're currently a Hamachi private server, I'll give the link to the client, and more info on Hamachi, Talk to me there! Connection info down below.
First step: Download Hamachi, [url=http://hamachi.en.softonic.com/]http://hamachi.en.softonic.com/[/url] Second Step: Click on Network -> Join an existing network. Third Step: Insert Network ID and Password. [b]Network ID: Parascape (Capital P) Password: 123[/b]
Once you're in my network, Talk to me, My name will be ''Paralyzed'' I'll help you get on the server.
I'm looking for Active staff members, And Players. I still need Admins, Mods, Coders Etc.

item.title: ParaScape 317, Looking for active players and staff!
item.dc:creator: @jetsebouma jetsebouma
item.description:
@jetsebouma wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:10, topic:507871”][quote author=jetsebouma link=topic=626106.msg4259197#msg4259197 date=1363282192]

I think you should add some more spaz to your thread, that way you will surely get people.

Thx for the tip, But I’m sort of not looking for a huge population of players yet, Just 1-3 people to help me set everything up.
[/quote]
Ah, I see. Well, gl with your server.[/quote]
Thank you very much!

Read full topic
item.source: ParaScape 317, Looking for active players and staff!

item.title: ParaScape 317, Looking for active players and staff!
item.dc:creator: @jetsebouma jetsebouma
item.description:
@jetsebouma wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:6, topic:507871”][quote author=kidgoku4522 link=topic=626106.msg4259121#msg4259121 date=1363272566]
EWWWWWWWWWW!
[/quote]
Please put more effort and constructive criticism into your posts rather than just posting comments such as this, consider this a warning.

@OP. From experience Hamachi isn’t really appropriate for hosting an RSPS, you need to make everything as easy as possible for the players and having Hamachi is an inconvenience towards them. The sooner you portforward the better :P[/quote]

Thx for the tip, I’m still working on portforwarding but my port is a bit weird, so it’s taking a lot of time to get it right.

Read full topic
item.source: ParaScape 317, Looking for active players and staff!

item.title: ParaScape 317, Looking for active players and staff!
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

kidgoku4522:

EWWWWWWWWWW!

Please put more effort and constructive criticism into your posts rather than just posting comments such as this, consider this a warning.

@OP. From experience Hamachi isn’t really appropriate for hosting an RSPS, you need to make everything as easy as possible for the players and having Hamachi is an inconvenience towards them. The sooner you portforward the better

Read full topic

[/quote]

Portforwarding would make it way way waaaaaaaaaaaaaay easyier.[/quote]

I know, I’ll probably be changing soon. But for now, I’ll stick with Hamachi,
